Reviews.Title: Great Camera & lens.
Reviews.Author: Jack Mack
Reviews.Content: The T5i and 18-55mm lens are wonderful and I'm having a blast learning all the creative scenes I can produce with it.  Only drawback is that, other than the spare battery and filters, the items included in the bundle are sub-standard.  The tripod and extra lenses are simply very cheaply made and useless to me.  My recommendation is to buy the camera body and the lenses you need then find good deals on Amazon for a good tripod, flash, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Buttermore
Reviews.Content: Great camera!  Some of the accessories are cheap but the camera with the canon lenses is worth the price.  Had some problems with shipping but Davis max reached out and made it right.

Reviews.Title: Free Items
Reviews.Author: Jekyll
Reviews.Content: The whole unit of Canon with the lenses are good. I don't like the free tripod and free items, looks so cheap and very China

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T5i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: acetolman
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife as a Wedding gift and she absolutely loves it. She has been wanting to get more into photography for several years now and this is a great starter for anyone looking to take there everyday photo taking to the next level.

Reviews.Title: T5i
Reviews.Author: Allan B.
Reviews.Content: Amazing! I'm in love with this camera! Everything I'm so glad I bought this pack it's exactly what I need

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: bahuba
Reviews.Content: I love the Canon camera and all the gadgets that are included with the price.  I will definitely recommend this seller to my buddies.  The accompanying lens are great and I will use them when I go overseas.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: Every thing arrived on time and more than I had expected. This is a gift for my daughter and she has not gotten it yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Value, Great Product
Reviews.Author: Craig Fine
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery, great price, arrived quickly and everything arrived safely. The only gripe I had, was the tri-pod was a big disappointment. The camera is amazing, can't wait to learn more about the camera. Have already been on two photo-shoots and the camera worked much more flawlessly than I did.If you want to set up your game and take the next step in photography, this is the retailer and product bundle to do it with. (less the tripod of course)Craig

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: Enrique Goldes
Reviews.Content: and it has everything that i needed. I sold the included lens with my old camera making it an interesting bundle, toghether with the cheap included accessories usefull for new photographers and kept my lenses. A nice solution that provided me a nice solution for getting rid (selling) my old camera.
